description:
Follow us on FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/GolfCaddie

BACKUP & RESTORE of all Golf Caddie data now include.  Online visibility to backed up data coming soon.

Track all your golf scores and statistics with Golf Caddie with integrated GPS functionality.
Want to know how far you have left to the hole?  Not a problem, Golf Caddie has integrated GPS for each hole and will indicate how far it is to the front, center and back of the green.  In addition, up to 5 other points of interest can be tracked, such as bunkers, water, etc.  Want to see just how far that monster drive was?  Golf Caddie can do that for you too.  Set the mark on the tee, hit your ball and let Golf Caddie do the rest.
Download as many courses as you want locally to your WebOS device. Create as many players as you'd like and keep track of their handicaps.
Keep track of the number of shots, putts, greens in regulation and fairways hit on a hole by hole basis and review this data after your round in the stats section.  Want to see a detailed score card? That's possible too.  See score, putts, GIR, FH, accumulative score to par and the drive distance.  See totals for the front nine, back nine and round.
Decide which clubs you have in your golf bag and how far you hit each club so that Golf Caddie can suggest a club when hitting into the green.  Club suggestions given for front, center and back of green.
Integrated help and instructions.
Currently over 10,100 courses are fully mapped and downloadable locally to your Palm WebOS device.
